entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell: GoBack on Android shows sandwich menu #24054
  • Invalidate() does not invoke Draw() #24035
  • Shadow is not updating on change of parent control. #24034
  • Crash on ios when open new screen or navigate back to it #24032
  • [MacCatalyst-resizetizer] SVG file does not generate density-dependent png files. #24030
  • Cannot Load JavaScript in WebView in .NET MAUI #24029
  • MAUI App crash at startup in net9.0.100-preview.6.24328.19 #24025

Closed

  • Button not showing when under a CollectionView in StackLayout on iOS #9164
    Backlog
  • .NET Maui - prevent tab navigation if there's unsaved data or condition #24040
  • Migrate legacy UI tests to Appium #20245
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Image can disappear when going back to the page. #14471
    .NET 8 SR8
  • GraphicsView does not call Drawable's Draw() after each Invalidate on iOS #9595
    Backlog
  • [Windows] New CarouselView item doesn't render unless Window is resized #17830
    Backlog
  • Entry/Editor Unfocused event is not triggering #24028
  • IconTintColor Not Applied While Converting MAUI View to Platform View #24014
  • [iOS] Add a permanent wrapper around ImageButton so it works with our various behaviors #23897
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Package from Xamarin to .NET 8 MAUI #24019

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Update to latest coherent builds #24051
  • Dev/net8 in net9 tests #24047
  • Place images in `drawable-nodpi` folder to stop scaling. #24039
  • Remove excessive Grid API comment #24037
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Chore] Add Android LoadImageFromFont benchmark #24033
    community ✨
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    community ✨

Merged

  • Release Branding SR8 #24052
  • Revert "[X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match (#22056)" #24046
  • Revert "[X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match (#22056)" #24049
  • Bump main to 8.0.90 #24050
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Build the previous TFMs #24041
  • Update the aar from CI #24038
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Bump macios to latest #24026
    9.0-preview7
  • Update Preview7 to .NET MAUI 8.0.72 #24042
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Check to see if Image Should Reload When Attached #24023
  • Added condition in WindowStateManager for selecting proper scene used #23945
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView not showing new items #23779
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Update Rebase GitHub Action #24031
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Remove the 'Resources' prefix from BundleResource #24024
  • [iOS] Add a Container around ImageButton #24020

Updated

  • Update net9 with release versions #24005
  • [net9.0] Bump to RC.1 #23967
    9.0-rc1
  • HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Account for safearea #23729
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Updating Maui templates to build unpackaged Windows apps by default #23787
    area-templates
  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-rc1
  • Fixed low quality images in Resizetizer #23924
    area-single-project, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Enable usage of private fields and properties in SetBinding path #23810
    area-xaml
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area-testing, area-controls-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [Android] Space character in Webview's Source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [iOS] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length #23877
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-editor
